title: Andrew Left Loses Second Bid to Toss Criminal Case Over Trades
description: A US judge denied short-seller Andrew Left’s request to toss out the criminal case against him over his trading activity on the grounds that it was a “selective prosecution” that targeted his online speech.
content: A US judge denied short-seller Andrew Left’s request to toss out the criminal case against him over his trading activity on the grounds that it was a “selective prosecution” that targeted his online speech.
